meanings.definition: Used to express surprise or admiration.
meanings.sent1: Whow! That magic trick was amazing!
meanings.sent2: Whow, you did a great job on your project!
meanings.sent3: Whow, I can't believe how fast you finished your homework!
meanings.sent4: Whow, the fireworks lit up the sky like a colorful painting!
meanings.sent5: Whow, the rainbow after the storm was a beautiful sight!

meanings.sent1: The whow of the crowd could be heard from far away.
meanings.sent2: She let out a whow when she saw the surprise party.
meanings.sent3: The whow of the baby startled the cat, making it jump.
meanings.sent4: His whow echoed through the valley, signaling his victory.
meanings.sent5: The whow of the thunder shook the windows in the house.
